plot: A young man falls overboard and is saved by a beautiful Polynesian girl. They fall in love, but their idyll is smashed when the local volcano begins to erupt. The man discovers that the local custom is to sacrifice a young woman to the volcanic gods. They try to escape but realize that &"east is east and west is west, and never the twain shall meet.&"   Written by  Ed Lorusso
title: Ave del paraíso
